attributes.review:
When I downloaded the app, it said I had to pay? I hate when that happens! I thought the app would be free but there is a 7-day free trial and I have to pay $20 a month. Yeah, no. Trump aint finna steal my money I worked for!

Screw. You.

Screw. Trump.

My money, not yours.
attributes.title: ⚠️DO NOT DOWNLOAD⚠️
